oracle.dmt.jdm.algorithm.ocluster
Interface OraOClusterSettings

All Superinterfaces:
javax.datamining.base.AlgorithmSettings, javax.datamining.clustering.ClusteringAlgorithmSettings
public interface OraOClusterSettings
extends javax.datamining.clustering.ClusteringAlgorithmSettings

OraOClusterSettings encapsulates the algorithm settings that can be specified for Orthogonal Partitioning Clustering (O-Clustering).

  • Sensitivity parameter defines a baseline density level, only areas with peak density above this baseline level can be identified as clusters. By default sensitivity is 0.5.
  • Buffer size parameter is used to control the maximum size of the memory buffer that can be used by the algorithm, this is represented as logical records. By default it is 50000 records. Based on the hardware availability this can be decreased or increased.
